sentences: Ta lubas mind aidata, et mitte langeda põrgusse.
Kui sa ei ole valmis, siis läheksid sa kohe põrgusse.
context: The word 'põrgusse' is the illative case of the noun 'põrgu', which means 'hell'. It is commonly used to express a strong desire or intention not to go somewhere unpleasant, in this case, hell.
